title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 705.5 - Technical advisory groups
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 705.5 - Technical advisory groups

State Regulations

The commissioner shall appoint appropriate technical
advisory groups to be comprised of members with expertise in the area of
innovations in medical technology, the medical profession, and health care
industry to review, and make recommendations relating to, the selection of
applications for demonstration projects. The technical advisory groups shall
meet as appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
705.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
